      • excludePatients

        @PostMapping("/{reportId}/$exclude")
public ReportModel excludePatients​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication,
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                   @AuthenticationPrincipal
                                   LinkCredentials user,
                                   @PathVariable("reportId")
                                   java.lang.String reportId,
                                   @RequestBody
                                   java.util.List<ExcludedPatientModel> excludedPatients)
                            throws org.apache.http.client.HttpResponseException
        Retrieves the DocumentReference and MeasureReport, ensures that each of the excluded Patients in the request are listed in the MeasureReport.evaluatedResources or as "excluded" extensions on the MeasureReport. Creates the excluded extension on the MR for each patient, DELETE's each patient. Re-evaluates the MeasureReport against the Measure. Increments the minor version number of the report in DocumentReference. Stores updates to the DR and MR back to the FHIR server.
        Parameters:
        authentication - Authentication information to create an IGenericClient to the internal FHIR store
        request - The HTTP request to create an IGenericClient to the internal FHIR store
        user - The user making the request, for the audit trail
        reportId - The ID of the report to re-evaluate after DELETE'ing/excluding the patients.
        excludedPatients - A list of patients to be excluded from the report, including reasons for their exclusion
        Returns:
        A ReportModel that has been updated to reflect the exclusions
        Throws:
        org.apache.http.client.HttpResponseException

        public void setConfig​(ApiConfig config)
